activity.note: Identified entities Mary 1, William Baldwin, and Sir Thomas Cawarden

message.subject: Check entities
message.body: Hi Kim, I've just uploaded the record of a letter from William Baldwin to Sir Thomas Cawarden. There are VIAF IDs for all three. Mary I has a REED/EATS ID 43849 with a URI of http://ereed.library.utoronto.ca/eats/entity/43849/. Not sure what to do with this now, but thought you'd want to check? D

message.subject: finished
message.body: this one was a weird one
